TopicTitle: My ship is haunted! (getting control input without me doing anything)

Articles.Content:
So one of my ships (the only mission I'm on right now) is moving and showing like it's getting input without me pressing anything; it's not a KB/M malfunction, it's not a controller, in fact it's not any connected hardware that I can think of; it's not SAS, it's not MechJeb, I have no idea what's causing it (ok, the behaviour points to MJ, but I've reinstalled it and it didn't solve the issue). The weirdest thing of it all is that I don't have any noticeable problem while ascending through the atmosphere.

SAS or MJ's Smart ASS make it stop, but once I try to turn my ship in any direction (specially the pitch) it will try to return to a point in the navball (as far as I could see the point SAS SASS was activated on).

Needless to say I can't point my ship in any direction, I've already tried: switching to the KSC and back, reconstructing the ship, relaunching it, loading a quicksave, loading an older save, controlling the ship from somewhere else and so on.

I must mention that I have a lot of mods, in fact KSP crashes all the time from OOM issues, it does not bother me that much since the game loads quite quickly.
